entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-12-20
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • IsInitOnly boolean property for PropertyDefinition in SDK #29616
  • [NetSDKE2E][Loc]With .Net 8 SDK installed in Chinese OS, the texts should not contain “Core” string when building the project. #29615

PullRequests

Created

  • Fix publish test TFMs #29627
    Area-ILLink
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 140: Build ID 2071036 #29624
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Update Verify and Verify.Diffplex #29623
    Area-Infrastructure, Area-Templates

Merged

  • add item template for directory.build.props and directory.build.targets #29526
    Area-Templates, Area-Common templates
  • Add the Microsoft.CodeAnalysis.CSharp.Workspaces as a reference package to the GenAPI Task project. #29604
    Area-GenAPI

Updated

  • Make `dotnet publish` use `Release` by default in 8.0+ Projects #29155
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Add net8.0 ILCompiler tests #29393
    Area-ILLink
  • fix locale-sensitive comparison of UnmatchedArgument error strings #29559
    Area-DotNet Test
  • Change .templateengine folder path #29449
    Area-Infrastructure, Area-dotnet new
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/7.0.2xx' => 'main' #29585
    Area-Infrastructure
